statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); dir="${cwd/#$HOME/\~}"; git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "detached"); if ! git -C "$cwd" diff-index --quiet HEAD -- 2>/dev/null; then status="*"; else status=""; fi; git_info=" on $(printf '\033[95m')${branch}${status}$(printf '\033[0m')"; fi; printf "$(printf '\033[36m')${user}$(printf '\033[0m') on $(printf '\033[35m')${host}$(printf '\033[0m') in $(printf '\033[32m')${dir}$(printf '\033[0m')${git_info}"
